/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and green, reflecting the architectural style of the region. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in urban landscapes. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
